statements: SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_schedule WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM project_schedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM project_schedule WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, milestone FROM project_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, milestone FROM project_schedule WHERE project_id > 2 ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date, milestone FROM project_schedule ORDER BY project_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_schedule WHERE milestone='Design' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM project_schedule WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM project_schedule WHERE project_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND milestone='Testing' ORDER BY project_name ASC
SELECT project_name, milestone FROM project_schedule WHERE end_date < '2022-06-30' ORDER BY milestone DESC, project_name ASC
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, deadline FROM projects WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_name, deadline, status FROM projects ORDER BY deadline ASC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, deadline FROM projects WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, deadline, status FROM projects WHERE status IN ('In Progress', 'On Hold') ORDER BY project_name;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_id, project_name, deadline FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, deadline, status FROM projects WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS total_milestones FROM projects JOIN milestones ON projects.project_id = milestones.project_id GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_milestones > 3;

SELECT projects.project_id, projects.project_name, milestones.milestone_name FROM projects INNER JOIN milestones ON projects.project_id = milestones.project_id WHERE milestones.completed_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY milestones.completed_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM deadlines ORDER BY deadline_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date = '2022-05-01';
SELECT project_name, milestone_name FROM projects p INNER JOIN milestones m ON p.id = m.project_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT projects.project_name, milestones.milestone_name, deadlines.description FROM projects JOIN milestones ON projects.id = milestones.project_id JOIN deadlines ON projects.id = deadlines.project_id;
SELECT project_name, end_date, description FROM projects JOIN deadlines ON projects.id = deadlines.project_id WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01' AND description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT project_name, start_date, milestone_date FROM projects JOIN milestones ON projects.id = milestones.project_id WHERE milestone_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM projects INNER JOIN milestones ON projects.id = milestones.project_id LEFT JOIN deadlines ON projects.id = deadlines.project_id;
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedule WHERE task_name LIKE '%research%';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(*) AS num_tasks FROM schedule GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM project WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, end_date FROM project WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' AND project_name LIKE 'Project%' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, task_name, project_id FROM schedule WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY project_id, start_date DESC;
SELECT deadline_id, project_id, task_name, due_date FROM deadline WHERE due_date > '2022-09-30' ORDER BY project_id ASC, due_date DESC;
SELECT milestone_id, milestone_name, project_id FROM milestone WHERE milestone_date <= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY milestone_name ASC, project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date FROM projects
SELECT project_name, status FROM projects WHERE status='In Progress'
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE due_date >= '2022-10-01' AND status='Pending'
SELECT task_name, due_date, status FROM tasks WHERE completed_date IS NULL
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT project_name, start_date, deadline FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, due_date, status FROM tasks WHERE status IN ('Pending', 'In Progress');
SELECT project_name, task_name, milestone_name, completion_date FROM projects INNER JOIN tasks ON projects.project_id = tasks.project_id INNER JOIN milestones ON tasks.task_id = milestones.task_id;

SELECT project_name, category_name FROM projects JOIN project_categories ON projects.project_id = project_categories.project_id JOIN categories ON project_categories.category_id = categories.category_id;
